name: Suru's Valley (Douzane)
description:
💻 Synopsis

SURU’S VALLEY was created for the 2018.2 Game Jam of the IFRJ Digital Games course at the Campus Engenheiro Paulo de Frontin, where the theme was an imbalance. Suru’s Valley is a 3D game where you control the population number of the Mins needing to exterminate or multiply them. Bizarre things happen as the game unfolds, revealing an obscure secret.

📜 Key Features
  • Isometric Camera
  • Score System
  • "Resource Management"
📚 Developer's Message

HO HO HO. This was one of my first unity games. I learned a lot from developing it. Also, I learned a lot about the things that I still had to learn. 🤨

🗣 Warnings
  • This game is only in Portuguese.
  • The secret is that i love berserk.
